summary: The document outlines an agenda for a meeting held on October 22, 2013, focusing on investment strategies and client partnerships. It includes discussions on entity transfers, investment objectives, and various investment opportunities across different sectors, including European recovery and technology.

events.title: Meeting Agenda
events.description: A meeting was held to discuss investment strategies, entity transfers, and client partnerships.

keyFacts: The meeting agenda includes discussions on investment objectives such as return objectives and risk appetite.
Investment opportunities discussed include European recovery and technology sector investments.
Tazia is a key participant in the meeting, contributing to multiple agenda items.
